title: Not the best horror movie ever
review: You people who are saying it is the best horror movie ever obviously aren't horror movie fans.  There are probably a thousand better horror movies. The Exorcist, Psycho, Night of the Living Dead, and Evil Dead just to name a few.  This movie will not bring about the golden age of horror (Vincent Price did that).  So for those of you who haven't seen it, don't build up your expectations. I...Live...Again Evil Ash
